text: infrastructure. Tower Hamlets Local Plan 247 INCLUSIVE ECONOMY AND GOOD GROWTH Supporting text 15.72 The Tower Hamlets Employment Land Review (2023) and the Affordable Workspace Study (2023) acknowledge the important role played by railway arches in providing low-cost workspace to a range of occupiers. Given the shortfall of available industrial land in the borough to meet the demand, it is essential to preserve spaces that can support industrial uses even where they fall outside of SIL and LSIS designations.
